positive.review: This was literally my childhood game aside from Animal Jam. I remembered playing this everyday before on the website. Glad to have it in steam! Will def play again and revisit this game üíó
Very interesting game, especially in Romania, because of the old community
My childhood game 10/10. And there are some people still playing this games. I play this games to remember childhood its peek.

I promised my future self as a kid, to never forget Transformice as this was my life, as im writting this i am not sarcastic, this game shaped my childhood and connected with Real Life people, i really appreciated they had Lithuanian Servers and many other country dedicated servers, the game also had great replayability and loads of content, developers kept us all busy and happy, sadly everyone grew up and left Transformice in the dust, but this game still to this day, a masterpiece of a flash game along with other Atelier 801 games, sadly most of them got shutdown and limited us to only Transformice, so many people also alternatively played Animal Jam which was another flash game that was like Club Penguin for many.

I'm planning on returning again one day, it's just depressing to see all my friendslist inactive and that time u see "Last seen 2014/05/04, nothing makes a grown up cry more than missing on your old buddies you played.

Rating: 10/10

This game is really fun! and you get to play as a cute little mouse! x3 It is a fun chill game but depending on what gamemode you choose it can be challenging aswell. The chat can be nice or not but when they are nice its fun to chat. The art is awesome too. overall i recommend this game! :3

I've been playing Transformice more than 10 years, with 420+ hours of play - fair to say it's a good game! It's not changed too much since it launched, but still keeps an active player base and community of regular players.
I really don't know what kind of review I can write for this game... Uhhh good? At... killing time? I guess?
silliest game ever ilove transformice
peak, i unfortunately lost my peak survivor skills from 2013

To get the cheese
To bring the cheese into the hole

mouse go mouse get cheese mouse go back to mouse hole. nostalgic.
My dear beloved and my enemy. I wish to see this game live many more years into the future.

This was literally my childhood game aside from Animal Jam. I remembered playing this everyday before on the website. Glad to have it in steam! Will def play again and revisit this game üíó

Oh man, this game is pure nostalgia. It's hard to believe that my 12+ year old account in this game is still up (more so that I still remember my nickname and password!). I just tried this game for a bit, and everyone's been chill so far. If you're looking for a VERY casual game to play after a stressful day, this one's perfect. :) You might also want to explore the different kinds of rooms/game modes you can do.
been playing this game since i was like 12 years old. in college now and i play it in class during lectures lmfao
It doesn't matter how many years I play this game for, I will never be good enough to do the damn bootcamp.

when i am shaman i shake... i am nervous.... rats don't take cheese and die..... and then they keep telling me kiss kiss kiss i don't understand who to kiss... at least i have my camarad friend kite kun with teeth bigger than average normal person, so when they tell me to kiss he bites them <3 i love this guys i feel very mature when i play with 40+ years old  a rats game <3
Very interesting game, especially in Romania, because of the old community

I promised my future self as a kid, to never forget Transformice as this was my life, as im writting this i am not sarcastic, this game shaped my childhood and connected with Real Life people, i really appreciated they had Lithuanian Servers and many other country dedicated servers, the game also had great replayability and loads of content, developers kept us all busy and happy, sadly everyone grew up and left Transformice in the dust, but this game still to this day, a masterpiece of a flash game along with other Atelier 801 games, sadly most of them got shutdown and limited us to only Transformice, so many people also alternatively played Animal Jam which was another flash game that was like Club Penguin for many.

I'm planning on returning again one day, it's just depressing to see all my friendslist inactive and that time u see "Last seen 2014/05/04, nothing makes a grown up cry more than missing on your old buddies you played.

Rating: 10/10
this is like the coolest game ive ever stumbled upon ily transformice x
Well, I haven't played it for long, but I guess it's fun. A lot of people to talk with and play. brings up fun memories, nostalgic
I'm just confused. Like it's a good game and all sure, but how on earth is it still alive and well?

I love this game so much! I dont rlly play regular rounds, I go into the village instead and use the dress up feature, im so glad they added it because there are so many outfits I would make IF i had the opportunity to use the items.

my only real complaints is that its not beginner friendly, pretty p2w, and community is built of millennials  who are toxic as hell, but the game is a cute throw back for anyone whose into that 2000s mmorpg game vibe
it's a pretty fun game, some of the game modes are a bit too hard, though. so i think a tutorial for all game modes and not just the main game mode would be helpful
My childhood game 10/10. And there are some people still playing this games. I play this games to remember childhood its peek.

veteran here, been playng since i was 8 , now i dont anymore but there is something so nostalgic about this game . i recomande it , its cute, is friendly, iti fun especially if you get friends and play on modules. nowdays there are not many players, but iti is what it is, it was nice while it lasted :) or maybe we ll bring it back up?
played this game a ton with my habbo friends and had a blast. idk if its for me anymore but its still a fun game if you wanna platform with strangers who hold your life in their hands.

The best free game from past years ‚Äî it‚Äôs crazy! I‚Äôve had my account open since 2012; it wasn‚Äôt on Steam before. It‚Äôs insane that I‚Äôve been playing this game for over 13 years and I still love its style. An excellent game to pass the time.

better than tomb rumble, and quite good.

can be laggy sometimes but honestly can make it funny.

better with friends

its a pretty good game just buggy and laggy. playerbase is not the best ngl but thats totally ok cuz ur not required to talk to anyone but i still like talking to others when theyre nice. the game in itself can get stale after a bit if ur just doing one thing, but i like going from survivor to vanilla to racing etc and that makes it more fun, plus the events r cool and you can get titles, cheese coins, special things to decorate ur account like badges and theyre overall a lot of fun! thats it this game is fun thats all lol (maybe the furs are too expensive but atleast strawberries r cheap)
Nostalgic, ever since I played it on flash, although the community has been... questionable.

I can't believe I'm still playing this a decade later. The core gameplay of grabbing cheese and racing back is timeless. The sheer creativity of player-made maps and the shaman class keeps it fresh. A timeless gem.

This game is really fun! and you get to play as a cute little mouse! x3 It is a fun chill game but depending on what gamemode you choose it can be challenging aswell. The chat can be nice or not but when they are nice its fun to chat. The art is awesome too. overall i recommend this game! :3

I've been playing Transformice more than 10 years, with 420+ hours of play - fair to say it's a good game! It's not changed too much since it launched, but still keeps an active player base and community of regular players.
mice game i use to play in 2015 that i remember liking alot (i never could figure out how to wall jump consistently lol)
This game was my childhood, I was thrilled to find this again on steam, and it is still as much fun as it was when I was ten and playing this every day.

Transformice is chaotic, fun, and surprisingly addictive. Leading your little mouse through tricky levels while trying not to get outpaced‚Äîor eaten‚Äîis hilarious and challenging. Multiplayer chaos adds endless laughs and surprises.

It‚Äôs simple to learn, but mastering the levels and teamwork keeps you coming back for more. Perfect for casual fun with friends (or strangers).

You think herding mice is easy? Think again. Transformice is chaos incarnate: one minute you‚Äôre a tiny furball racing for cheese, the next a Shaman‚Äôs contraption flings you across the map like a furry missile. Physics hates you, cannons hate you, and that one mouse who always steals your cheese definitely hates you. And somehow, it‚Äôs hilarious. 10/10, would get flung again.
People having mouse sex and calling me slurs, I ate some rotten cheese and now I'm sick.
Love this game, played more than 100k rounds from 2011 untill 2012, good memories about Thejkb becaming the first getting 40k firsts.
funny cheese game, very nice very good.
I really don't know what kind of review I can write for this game... Uhhh good? At... killing time? I guess?
grinding 1000 cheese to get access to a shitty mini forum is a bit much but its cool
been playing since 2016. fun and simple. easy to sink many hours into. only way to enjoy it though is with chat covered cause the servers are consistently toxic.

A surprisingly charming little game. Simple to pick up, hard to master. Offers fun and chaotic cooperative gameplay with a unique premise. The community is generally friendly, and there's a surprising amount of depth and creativity hidden within its deceptively basic appearance.

I've been playing this game since 2014 when i was in school i always come back to this game once in a while i stopped playing when flash died but i came back when i saw it was on steam the game is very much always and is getting a bunch of events and the lobbyies a mostly populated

and with all those yeare i still cant wall jump properly XD
silliest game ever ilove transformice
Funny, silly and fun with friends
This game is an absolute childhood joy and it has never lost its charm. Forever a gem.
I used to play this game all the time in my childhood. I still can't do Bootcamp and rage quit. Maybe I'll be better next year. <33
peak, i unfortunately lost my peak survivor skills from 2013
been a player since 2017 and still no furs. peak game

Childhood game. I am so glad that this game still exists!
this is my childhood game and seems this game going to live forever
If you think valorant has an e-dating problem then you never played this game.
mouse go mouse get cheese mouse go back to mouse hole. nostalgic.
Been playing this game since 2011, Occasionally come back to it and never get sick of it.
good game dont need anymore explaining
It reminds me of the story of squirrels
It is nice seeing one of my childhood games here.
The best game where you can chase mouse for cheese
My dear beloved and my enemy. I wish to see this game live many more years into the future.
not bad , just for fun
its very fun and cuuuuute :>
Back after 10 years. Love this game
This game truly makes you feel like a rodent

>Start game.
>Join room
>Get cheese till shaman.
>Become shaman
>Help every mouse asides from one. Let's call this mouse "Tony".
>Kill Tony.
>Everyone asides from Tony calls me "Great Shaman".
>Tony rages.
>Tony says "Bad shaman"
>Tony starts cursing in all caps.
>Everyone insults Tony.
>Tony claims to be crying in real life.
>Ask Tony for age.
>Tony says he's 8.
>Someone in room says Tony is too young to be playing. (Although most of the community is filled with children.)
>Tony's mother begins to type.
>Tony's mother scolds us for "cyber-bullying".
>Become shaman again. (I overtook Tony as he became fixated on typing.)
>Kill Tony's mother
>Tony's mother begins to curse and insult "today's youth".
>All shamans begin targeting Tony's mother.
>Tony begins to type.
>Tony says his mother is calling police.
>Tony calls us criminals.
>Call Tony ‚ô•‚ô•‚ô•‚ô•‚ô•‚ô•.
>Tony says we are all going to jail.
>Tony quits.

11/10 would get jail-threats again.
funny mice who like to have fun will enjoy this game
most people are very nice and welcoming
I've seen a similar game somewhere.
roleplay as a cat here
Cute and fun game

The game is really good
good game genuinely

negative.review: never mind the community on this game is still largely off pudding and strange
Players just sabotage each other constantly
rage game
no
never mind the community on this game is still largely off pudding and strange

Pretty janky and unforgiving to new players. Not very intuitive to figure out what you're supposed to do (especially when you're the shaman). There seems to be a community around it, but some members seem a bit toxic.
im just a little mouse and the other little mice bully me and call me evil names for not being able to reach the cheese... i was cheesed to meet you all and got mousetrapped instead ...

if i was writing this review those 10 years ago, it would be a positive review

but in (almost) 2026, i genuinely wish they just shut it down. it's clearly on its deathbed, only 1 admin has remained from the core team, the rest is ran by community. there are only a handful people playing, MAU being so low country-specific rooms don't even exist anymore

that was by no means a terrible game (it had its flaws, severe and petty), but it's time to go, and everything comes to an end.
I wish i could still like this game like i used to but the community just limits that possibility.
Players just sabotage each other constantly
These days only weird people and cheaters playing this game
got banned in 30 minutes for being called "ClownBoner"
Lots of jerks, ruin the fun.
rage game
